name: JetLoader
description: This is a quick entry for the Loading Jam 2015. It was a prototype of how the loading screen could be used to supplement the main game. CONTROLS: ASWD or arrow keys to move. B,N,M to switch what build mode during loading screen, N to fire during actual game. With my limited available time, I would like to have made the main game more satisfying, but I hope you enjoy nonetheless as this is my first jam : )
